room_title: Escape room "The Secret Bunker" by Escape-A-Torium in Fayetteville (WV)
room_description: It’s happening! Our worst nightmare! Missiles have been launched. Not sure who struck first but our only chance for survival is finding a secret Cold War–era bunker said to once exist at this very resort. We have less than 60 minutes to find it and make it operational. Our chances of survival are not good.
